avalancheActivity.comment:
The wind slabs can be released, especially by large additional loads,. The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular in gullies and bowls above approximately 2500 m and at transitions from a shallow to a deep snowpack.
In particular in steep rocky terrain and on very steep grassy slopes more medium-sized moist and wet avalanches are possible as a consequence of warming during the day. The avalanche prone locations for wet avalanches are to be found in particular below approximately 2300 m.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The wind slabs of the last few days must be evaluated with care and prudence in high Alpine regions. Moist and wet avalanches are possible as a consequence of warming during the day and solar radiation.

snowpackStructure.comment: Fresh wind slabs have settled a little. Snow depths vary greatly at intermediate and high altitudes, depending on the infuence of the wind. Sunshine and high temperatures will give rise as the day progresses to increasing moistening of the snowpack in particular on sunny slopes at low and intermediate altitudes.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The fresh and somewhat older wind slabs can be released in particular on very steep north, east and southeast facing slopes. The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular in gullies and bowls above approximately 2500 m and at transitions from a shallow to a deep snowpack. In some cases the avalanches are medium-sized and can mostly be released by large loads. In particular in high Alpine regions these avalanche prone locations are more prevalent.
In particular in steep rocky terrain and on very steep grassy slopes moist and wet avalanches are possible as a consequence of warming. The avalanche prone locations for wet avalanches are to be found in particular below approximately 2500 m.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The wind slabs of the last few days represent the main danger. Moist and wet avalanches are possible as a consequence of warming.

snowpackStructure.comment: Sunshine and high temperatures gave rise to gradual consolidation of the snowpack in particular at low and intermediate altitudes. Snow depths vary greatly at intermediate and high altitudes, depending on the infuence of the wind. At low altitude only a little snow is lying. Sunshine and high temperatures will give rise as the day progresses to increasing moistening of the snowpack in particular on sunny slopes above approximately 2500 m.

avalancheActivity.comment: The more recent wind slabs can be released, especially by large additional loads, in particular on very steep shady slopes above approximately 2700 m. The avalanche prone locations are to be found in gullies and bowls and in the vicinity of peaks. In some places wind slabs are lying on an icy crust. Restraint should be exercised because avalanches can sweep people along and give rise to falls. In particular on very steep sunny slopes individual mostly small moist and wet avalanches are possible as a consequence of warming during the day.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs represent the main danger, especially along the border with France. Moist and wet avalanches are possible as a consequence of warming.

snowpackStructure.comment: Sunshine and high temperatures gave rise to gradual consolidation of the snowpack. Below approximately 2200 m from a snow sport perspective, in most cases insufficient snow is lying. Above approximately 2500 m snow depths vary greatly at intermediate and high altitudes, depending on the infuence of the wind. Sunshine and high temperatures will give rise as the day progresses to increasing moistening of the snowpack in particular on sunny slopes at intermediate and high altitudes.

avalancheActivity.comment: Very early morning: Even in moderately steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the icy crust. In particular on very steep sunny slopes and at higher altitudes individual small moist and wet avalanches are possible as a consequence of warming.
avalancheActivity.highlights: From a snow sport perspective, in most cases insufficient snow is lying. Isolated small moist and wet avalanches are possible as a consequence of warming.

snowpackStructure.comment: In particular at low and intermediate altitudes hardly any snow is lying. Sunshine and high temperatures will give rise as the day progresses to increasing moistening of the snowpack in particular on sunny slopes at elevated altitudes.

avalancheActivity.comment: Very early morning: Even in moderately steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the icy crust.
avalancheActivity.highlights: From a snow sport perspective, in most cases insufficient snow is lying.

snowpackStructure.comment: In all altitude zones hardly any snow is lying.
